analysis: The project is a website about black holes with existing CSS, HTML, and JavaScript files. The current theme is not fully developed for a cosmic, dark theme with animations. The CSS file needs to be completed with a black hole theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be completed with all sections related to black holes, including interactive planets and animated slides. The JavaScript file needs to be fixed for syntax errors and completed to ensure all functions are properly implemented.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a full cosmic theme including dark background, black hole animations, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to include all sections related to black holes, such as interactive planets, animated slides, and other relevant sections.
Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
